Html:
GoblinXNA works very great for me, but i have a question, maybe a simple one but very important for me

i am creating a game using Goblin XNA, and i want to add "pause" feature ,image that being rendered by goblin xna is stopped (so do for the marker tracking) and it can continue if the player want

is it possible to do this?

Scene.FreezeVideo freezes the video, but it still performs tracking on the background. If you want to pause anything else, you need to do that yourself.

Ohan
